text: @marcorubio Typical GOP idiot. We have coronavirus  all over the United States. We've never seen this president's tax returns and no he is laundered money and avoid paying his taxes. Marco Rubio's focusing on Benjamin Franklin's daylight savings time. What a week senator🤮🤮🤮
